resources.string: Button to go from Info Activity to Options Activity

Decide the way the camera flash behaves. 
 ON: taking pictures with the flash 
 OFF: disable the flash 
 AUTOMATIC: the app decides when to activate the flash 
 ALWAYS ON: constant illumination.

Turn on smart delay to take a photo when a person is detected from camera.\n Turn on notification sound to be aware when a person is spotted.\n Hint: is useful when you want to take a photo of yourself but you are alone.
